input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large)

Product specifications:
Measures 30" x 48"
Made of coir coco palm fiber and painted using fade resistant enamel paints
Simply vacuum or hose down to clean

Product description:
Welcome guests to your home in style
Features colorful poppies
input_text.Response A: Ooh, look at this pretty doormat! 😍 It's so big and fun! 🎉 Made from super soft coir coco palm fiber and painted with yummy colors, it'll make your guests feel special and your home look fabulous! 🏠👩‍👧‍👦 Just vacuum or hose it down to clean, easy peasy! 💪🏽💦 Get one now and make your home even more amazing! 😊
input_text.Response B:
Are you looking for a way to add a touch of style to your home? 
The Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat is a great way to do just that. 
This extra large doormat measures 30" x 48" and is made of coir coco palm fiber. 
The mat is painted using fade resistant enamel paints and features colorful poppies.
Simply vacuum or hose down to clean.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
